Nationality

Create nationality

Request POST

/api/nationality/admin/create/
Parameter Type Position # Description
name string body Required name of nationality
country_id int body Required country id
is_active boolean body Required this is activated

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
        "item": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "...",
            "is_active": False,
            "created_at": "2021-02-07",
            "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
        },
        "form_errors": {}
    }

All Nationality For Admin

Request POST

/api/nationality/admin/all/
Parameter Type Position # Description

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "...",
                "country": "...",
                "is_active": False,
                "created_at": "2021-02-07",
                "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "country": "...",
                "is_active": False,
                "created_at": "2021-02-07",
                "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
            },
        ]
    }

Toggle active Nationality

Request POST

/api/nationality/admin/int:pk/toggle-active/
Parameter Type Position # Description
is_active boolean body Required is it activated ?

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
        "item": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "...",
            "is_active": True,
            "created_at": "2021-02-07",
            "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
        },
    }

Update Nationality

Request POST

/api/nationality/admin/int:pk/update/
Parameter Type Position # Description
name string body Required name of nationality
country_id int body Required country id
is_active boolean body Required this is activated

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
        "item": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "...",
            "is_active": False,
            "created_at": "2021-02-07",
            "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
        },
        "form_errors": {}
    }

Delete Nationality

Request POST

/api/nationality/admin/int:pk/delete/
Parameter Type Position # Description

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
    }
